movies.title: Ali: Fear Eats the Soul
movies.plot: Emmi, a German woman in her mid-sixties, falls in love with Ali, a Moroccan immigrant worker around twenty-five years younger. When they abruptly decide to marry, everyone around them seems appalled. When the folks calm down a bit, Emmi and Ali's relationship grows uncertain.
movies.simplePlot: An almost accidental romance is kindled between a German woman in her mid-sixties and a Moroccan migrant worker around twenty-five years younger. They abruptly decide to marry, appalling everyone around them.

biography.bio: Brigitte Mira was born on April 20, 1910 in Hamburg, Germany. She was an actress, known for Drei Damen vom Grill (1977), Ali: Fear Eats the Soul (1974) and The Enigma of Kaspar Hauser (1974). She was married to Frank Guerente, Horst Fabian, Paul Cornelius, Reinhold Tabatt and Peter Schütte. She died on March 8, 2005 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Brigitte Mira

biography.bio: El Hedi ben Salem was born in 1935 in Morocco. He was an actor, known for Ali: Fear Eats the Soul (1974), Le marchand des quatre saisons (1972) and Martha (1974). He died in 1976 in Nîmes, Gard, France.
biography.name: El Hedi ben Salem

biography.bio: Irm Hermann was born on October 4, 1942 in Munich, Germany as Irmgard Hermann. She is an actress and assistant director, known for Ali: Fear Eats the Soul (1974), Le marchand des quatre saisons (1972) and The Downfall of Berlin: Anonyma (2008). She is married to Dietmar Roberg. They have two children.
biography.name: Irm Hermann

biography.bio: Elma Karlowa was born on March 12, 1932 in Zagreb, Yugoslavia as Selma-Karolina Karlowac. She was an actress, known for Ali: Fear Eats the Soul (1974), Almenrausch und Edelweiß (1957) and Martha (1974). She died on December 31, 1994 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Elma Karlowa

biography.bio: Anita Bucher is an actress, known for Ali: Fear Eats the Soul (1974), Quadrille (1961) and Die verschenkten Jahre (1966).
biography.name: Anita Bucher

biography.bio: Gusti Kreissl was born on January 2, 1904 in Munich, Germany. She was an actress, known for Ali: Fear Eats the Soul (1974), Le marchand des quatre saisons (1972) and Nur der Freiheit gehört unser Leben (1969). She died in August 1986 in Munich, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Gusti Kreissl

biography.bio: Doris Mattes was born on October 7, 1938. She was an actress, known for Ali: Fear Eats the Soul (1974), Le bouc (1969) and Pourquoi monsieur R. est-il atteint de folie meurtrière? (1970). She died on July 23, 2013 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Doris Mattes

biography.bio: Margit Symo was born on September 13, 1913 in Budapest, Austria-Hungary. She was an actress, known for Ali: Fear Eats the Soul (1974), Piroschka (1955) and Le maître de poste (1940). She was married to Willy Mattes. She died on October 6, 1992 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Margit Symo

biography.bio: Katharina Herberg was born on May 27, 1935 in Oberstdorf, Bavaria, Germany. She is an actress and editor, known for Ali: Fear Eats the Soul (1974), Yodeling Is No Sin (1974) and Fais ta valise Sherlock Holmes (1960).
biography.name: Katharina Herberg

biography.placeOfBirth: Free City of Danzig [now Gdansk, Pomorskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Lilo Pempeit was born on October 6, 1922 in Free City of Danzig as Liselotte Pempeit. She was an actress, known for Ali: Fear Eats the Soul (1974), Pourquoi monsieur R. est-il atteint de folie meurtrière? (1970) and The Marriage of Maria Braun (1979). She was married to Helmut Fassbinder. She died on May 7, 1993 in Munich, Germany.
biography.name: Lilo Pempeit

biography.bio: Peter Gauhe was born on June 8, 1940. He is a cinematographer and actor, known for Ali: Fear Eats the Soul (1974), The Sprinter (1984) and Reporter (1989).
biography.name: Peter Gauhe

biography.bio: Marquard Bohm was born on June 27, 1941 in Hamburg, Germany. He was an actor and director, known for Ali: Fear Eats the Soul (1974), Kings of the Road (1976) and Beware of a Holy Whore (1971). He died on February 3, 2006 in Wetter an der Ruhr, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany.
biography.name: Marquard Bohm

biography.bio: Walter Sedlmayr was loved by his audience very much, but nobody knew the real Sedlmayr. He always kept his privat life very private, and it was revealed after his death that he was homosexual. He couldn't come out as a homosexual for different reasons, but the main reason was surely his reputation as a typical bavarian man. When he was brutally killed, it was rumoured that a young prostitute could have killed him, but it was found out that two very close friends and businesspartners killed him. The people were shocked by the brutality of his senseless death
biography.name: Walter Sedlmayr

biography.bio: Hannes Gromball was born on March 21, 1932 in Germany. He is known for his work on Ali: Fear Eats the Soul (1974), Le bouc (1969) and Pourquoi monsieur R. est-il atteint de folie meurtrière? (1970).
biography.name: Hannes Gromball

biography.bio: Hark Bohm was born on May 18, 1939 in Hamburg, Germany. He is an actor and director, known for Underground (1995), The Marriage of Maria Braun (1979) and Paradis express (1997). He is married to Natalia Bowakow. They have six children.
biography.name: Hark Bohm

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Won Prize of the Ecumenical Jury

categories.category: Best Performance by an Actress in a Leading Role (Beste darstellerische Leistung - Weibliche Hauptrolle)

keywords: looking at oneself in a mirror
mother in law son in law relationship
